fields.q_text: Which of these words would he not use to describe himself?
fields.discussion: Do you think any of these words describe you?

fields.q_text: What does he think is his biggest weakness as a teacher?
fields.ans_a: Difficulty in explaining concepts clearly and simply.
fields.ans_b: Dislike of English as a language.
fields.ans_d: Lack of enough time to create new materials.
fields.discussion: What do you think is his biggest weakness? What do you think is your biggest weakness in work?

fields.q_text: Which of these is his favorite area of Taipei?
fields.discussion: Which of these areas is your favorite? Are there any other areas of Taipei you enjoy even more?

fields.q_text: If all of these jobs offered identical pay and work conditions, which would be his last choice?
fields.discussion: How would you rank these from first to last choice (changing 'English' to 'Chinese')?

fields.q_text: Which of these things most annoys him?
fields.discussion: Which of these things annoys you most? Can you think of anything else that annoys you even more?

fields.q_text: Which of these statements is true?
fields.discussion: Which of these is your favorite and least favorite? What is your favorite Taiwanese snack of all? What snacks from other cuisines do you especially enjoy?

fields.q_text: Which of these jobs has he not had?
fields.discussion: Have you had any of these jobs, or similar ones? Which would you choose if they all paid the same? What's the most unusual job you've had?

fields.q_text: Which of these jobs does he think he would be best at?
fields.ans_d: Teacher of Chinese as a foreign language.
fields.discussion: Do you think you would be good at any of these jobs?
